name: International Conference on Marketing, Tourism, Hospitality & Sustainable Development-Dubai
content: Dear & Esteemed Colleagues, Greetings! It gives us immense pleasure to extend a warm welcome to you to the upcoming International Conference on Marketing, Tourism, Hospitality & Sustainable Development (MTC18Dubai Conference). May we cordially invite you to be part of the upcoming academic research conference in the beautiful city of Dubai, UAE in the month of October 6-7, 2018\. We welcome you to submit your research papers/abstracts/case studies in all areas of business and social research. You may also submit your abstracts/full papers/case studies using the ‘online submission window’ available at the ‘paper submission’ page or you may also submit your abstracts or full paper or case studies or posters to our conference email id: dubaioctconf@globalbizresearch.org. Panel Discussion! As a part of the conference, it is our avowed objective to offer a greater experience for the delegates by organizing panel discussions, invited presentations on topics of interest to the academic community. Topic: “Technology and Your Class” – Changing Scenario!
